name: Tween
description: Animate the properties of an object over time

conditions.name: On finished
conditions.description: Triggered when a tween with a matching tag finishes.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The tag or tags of the finished tweens.

conditions.name: Is playing
conditions.description: Test if a tween with a matching tag is playing.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The tag or tags of the tweens to check.

conditions.name: Is any playing
conditions.description: Test if any tween is currently playing.

conditions.name: Is paused
conditions.description: Test if a tween with a matching tag is paused.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The tag or tags of the tweens to check.

conditions.name: Is any paused
conditions.description: Test if any tween is currently paused.

conditions.name: On any looped
conditions.description: Triggered when any tween loops for any reason.

conditions.name: On looped
conditions.description: Triggered when a tween with a matching tag loops for any reason.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The tag or tags of the looped tweens.

params.name: State
params.description: The state of ping-pong to check for.

conditions.name: On ping-pong
conditions.description: Triggered when a tween with a matching tag ping-pongs.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The tag or tags of the ping-ponged tweens.

params.name: State
params.description: The state of ping-pong to check for.

conditions.name: Is ping-pong
conditions.description: Test for the ping-pong state of the tweens with the matching tag. If a tween is not set to ping-pong, the condition is always false.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The tag or tags of the ping-ponged tweens.

params.name: State
params.description: The state of ping-pong to check for.

conditions.name: Is any ping-pong
conditions.description: Test for the ping-pong state of any tween. If a tween is not set to ping-pong, the condition is always false.

params.name: State
params.description: The state of ping-pong to check for.

conditions.name: On released
conditions.description: Triggered when a tween with a matching tag is released.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The tag or tags of the released tweens.

conditions.name: On any released
conditions.description: Triggered when any tween is released.

actions.name: Set enabled
actions.description: Set whether the behavior is enabled or disabled. When disabled the behavior will not affect any properties.

params.name: Mode
params.description: The state to set

actions.name: Tween (one property)
actions.description: Tween one property such as the X co-ordinate.
actions.display_text: {my} [b]{0}[/b] property [b]{1}[/b] to [b]{2}[/b] in [b]{3}[/b] seconds ([i]{4}[/i], destroy: [i]{5}[/i], loop: [i]{6}[/i], ping pong: [i]{7}[/i], repeat count: [i]{8}[/i])

params.name: Tags
params.description: A space-separated list of tags to identify a tween (optional).

params.name: Property
params.description: The property to tween.

params.name: End value
params.description: The end value of the tween. Specify colors with the rgbEx() expression.

params.name: Time
params.description: The duration of the tween, in seconds.

params.name: Ease
params.description: The easing function to use.

params.name: Destroy on complete
params.description: Whether the affected instance should be destroyed as soon as the tween finishes.

params.name: Loop
params.description: Whether to loop the tween or not.

params.name: Ping pong
params.description: Whether to tween back and forth or not.

params.name: Repeat count
params.description: The amount of times to repeat the animation

actions.name: Tween (two properties)
actions.description: Tween two properties, such as the position (consisting of an X and Y co-ordinate).
actions.display_text: {my} [b]{0}[/b] property [b]{1}[/b] to [b]{2}, {3}[/b] in [b]{4}[/b] seconds ([i]{5}[/i], destroy: [i]{6}[/i], loop: [i]{7}[/i], ping pong: [i]{8}[/i], repeat count: [i]{9}[/i])

params.name: Tags
params.description: Optional space-separated list of many tags to identify a tween.

params.name: Property
params.description: The properties to tween.

params.name: Time
params.description: The duration of the tween, in seconds.

params.name: Ease
params.description: The easing function to use.

params.name: Destroy on complete
params.description: Whether the affected instance should be destroyed as soon as the tween finishes.

params.name: End X
params.description: The end value of the first property.

params.name: End Y
params.description: The end value of the second property.

params.name: Loop
params.description: Whether to loop the tween or not.

params.name: Ping pong
params.description: Whether to tween back and forth or not.

params.name: Repeat count
params.description: The amount of times to repeat the animation

actions.name: Tween (value)
actions.description: Tween a number value, independent of any properties.
actions.display_text: {my} [b]{0}[/b] value from [b]{1}[/b] to [b]{2}[/b] in [b]{3}[/b] seconds ([i]{4}[/i], destroy: [i]{5}[/i], loop: [i]{6}[/i], ping pong: [i]{7}[/i], repeat count: [i]{8}[/i])

params.name: Tags
params.description: A space-separated list of tags to identify a tween (optional).

params.name: Start value
params.description: The start value of the tween.

params.name: End value
params.description: The end value of the tween.

params.name: Time
params.description: The duration of the tween, in seconds.

params.name: Ease
params.description: The easing function to use.

params.name: Destroy on complete
params.description: Whether the affected instance should be destroyed as soon as the tween finishes.

params.name: Loop
params.description: Whether to loop the tween or not.

params.name: Ping pong
params.description: Whether to tween back and forth or not.

params.name: Repeat count
params.description: The amount of times to repeat the animation

actions.name: Pause
actions.description: Pause tweens with the given tags.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The tag or tags of the tweens to pause.

actions.name: Pause all
actions.description: Pause all tweens.

actions.name: Resume
actions.description: Resume any paused tweens with the given tags.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The tag or tags of the paused tweens to resume.

actions.name: Resume all
actions.description: Resume all paused tweens.

actions.name: Stop
actions.description: Stop the tweens with the given tags. Tweens can no longer be referenced after stopping them.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The tag or tags of the tweens to stop.

actions.name: Stop all
actions.description: Stop all tweens. Tweens can no longer be referenced by tag after stopping them.

actions.name: Set ease
actions.description: Set the easing function of the tweens with the given tags.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The tag or tags of the tweens to set the easing function for.

params.name: Ease
params.description: The ease function to set.

actions.name: Set all eases
actions.description: Set the ease function of all tweens.

params.name: Ease
params.description: The easing function to set.

actions.name: Set end value
actions.description: Set the end value of tweens with the given tags.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The tag or tags of the tweens to set the end value for.

params.name: Property
params.description: The property to change.

params.name: End value
params.description: The end value to set. Specify colors with the rgbEx() expression.

actions.name: Set end values
actions.description: Set the end value of the tweens with the given tags.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The tag or tags of the tweens to set the end value of.

params.name: Property
params.description: The property to change

params.name: End X
params.description: The end value to set in the first property.

params.name: End Y
params.description: The end value to set in the second property.

actions.name: Set start value
actions.description: Set the start value of any value tweens with the given tags.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The tag or tags of the tweens to set the start value for.

params.name: Start value
params.description: The start value to set.

actions.name: Set end value
actions.description: Set the end value of any value tweens with the given tags.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The tag or tags of the tweens to set the end value for.

params.name: End value
params.description: The end value to set.

actions.name: Set time
actions.description: Set the time of the tweens with the given tags.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The tag or tags of the tweens to set the time of.

params.name: Time
params.description: The time to set, in seconds.

actions.name: Set all times
actions.description: Set the time of all tweens.

params.name: Time
params.description: The time to set, in seconds.

actions.name: Set playback rate
actions.description: Set the playback rate of the tweens with the given tags.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The tag or tags of the tweens to set the playback rate of.

params.name: Rate
params.description: The playback rate to set.

actions.name: Set all playback rates
actions.description: Set the playback rate of all tweens.

params.name: Rate
params.description: The playback rate to set.

actions.name: Set destroy on complete
actions.description: Set the 'destroy on complete' property of the tweens with the given tags.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The tag or tags of the tweens to set the property of.

params.name: Destroy on complete
params.description: Whether the affected instance should be destroyed as soon as the tween finishes.

actions.name: Set all destroy on complete
actions.description: Set the 'destroy on complete' property of all tweens.
actions.display_text: Set all {my} to destroy on complete: [b]{0}[/b]

params.name: Destroy on complete
params.description: Whether the affected instance should be destroyed as soon as the tween finishes.

expressions.name: Time
expressions.description: The current time of the tween.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The tag of the tween to get the time from. Leave empty for the first tween.

expressions.name: Progress
expressions.description: The progress of the tween in the range 0-1.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The tag of the tween to get the progress from. Leave empty for the first tween.

expressions.name: Value
expressions.description: The current value of a 'Value' tween

params.name: Tag
params.description: The tag of the tween to get the value from. Leave empty for the first 'Value' tween.

expressions.name: Tags
expressions.description: The tags of a tween in 'On any tween finished', 'On any tween looped' and 'On any tween ping pong' triggers.

expressions.name: PlaybackRate
expressions.description: The playback rate of the tween.

params.name: Tag
params.description: The tag of the tween to get the playback rate from. Leave empty for the first tween.
